property.name: chorus.termsaccepted
property.description: By setting this value to yes, you agree you have read and accepted the Chorus license agreement. Installation will not occur if the value is anything other than 'yes'.

property.name: chorus.installation.installerpath
property.description: The chorus installer's absolute file path.

property.name: chorus.installation.directory
property.description: The absolute path to the install location. You must have write permissions to the location you specify.

property.name: chorus.installation.datadirectory
property.description: The absolute path to the data directory. You must have write permissions to the location you specify. Recommended data directory is at least 500GB.

property.name: chorus.security.salt
property.description: Enter passphrase used to generate a recoverable secret key for encrypting passwords. By default one will be generated randomly.
